title: Truth: PS-SHA∞ reference library (client+server)
summary: Create a minimal PS-SHA∞ lib for Python/JS: deterministic content signature w/ daily salt via 𝔅(t).
problem: We need a canonical, content-addressed signature that encodes Lucidia’s truth state. Use HMAC-SHA256 with a rotating daily salt derived from 𝔅(t) seed and date; expose `ps_sha_infinity(payload, date)`.
constraints: Do not hardcode secrets in client build; read from env on server and from meta tag at runtime in the browser.
acceptance_criteria: Identical signatures for same payload+date across Python and JS
Server automatically signs LRfR records on submit
